type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Trident Enchantment

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/trident_enchantment).

Compares a `TridentEntity`'s enchantment level with a specified value.

Type ID: `apugli:trident_enchantment`

---

### Example
```json
"condition": {
    "type": "apugli:trident_enchantment",
    "enchantment": "minecraft:riptide",
    "comparison": "==",
    "compare_to": 0
}
```
This example tests whether a Trident entity has no levels of riptide.

### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Trident Enchantment

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/trident_enchantment).

Compares a `TridentEntity`'s enchantment level with a specified value.

Type ID: `apugli:trident_enchantment`

---

### Example
```json
"condition": {
    "type": "apugli:trident_enchantment",
    "enchantment": "minecraft:riptide",
    "comparison": "==",
    "compare_to": 0
}
```
This example tests whether a Trident entity has no levels of riptide.

enchantment.description: The identifier of the enchantment to test.
enchantment.markdownDescription: The identifier of the enchantment to test.

comparison.description: How the amount of particles within the specified radius which are the specified should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How the amount of particles within the specified radius which are the specified should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value to compare the amount to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value to compare the amount to.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Trident Enchantment (Entity Condition Type) date: 2023-02-08

Trident Enchantment

Entity Condition Type.

Compares a TridentEntity's enchantment level with a specified value.

Type ID: apugli:trident_enchantment

Fields

Field Type Default Description
enchantment Identifier The identifier of the enchantment to test.
comparison Comparison >= How the amount of particles within the specified radius which are the specified should be compared to the specified value.
compare_to Integer The value to compare the amount to.

Example

"condition": {
    "type": "apugli:trident_enchantment",
    "enchantment": "minecraft:riptide",
    "comparison": "==",
    "compare_to": 0
}

This example tests whether a Trident entity has no levels of riptide.
